page.title: 17RECREATION_SUMMER BRAE
page.content:
FOOTBALL Delting is the local football team and has teams at Under 13,UNder 15,UNDER 18 and senior level.the teams train throughout the winter and play in the summer leagues.The senior team plays in the Viking league and Parish cup.The school has both a Primary and Secondary football team which take part in the summer school leagues.Both have won their league cups.
HOCKEY & NETBALL Netball is played in the school league.Two local girls have been selected to play for Shetland against Orkney.Three local hockey players play in a senior side.One of the school girls will also be playing hockey for Shetland in the Inter_county.
